thread.section_title: The Benjamin - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Perfect Location! Perfect Stay!
thread.title_full: Perfect Location! Perfect Stay! - Review of The Benjamin, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Dana K
title: Perfect Location! Perfect Stay!
text: I picked The Benjamin based on location then on Trip Advisor reviews. It was BETTER than the best review! I emailed the week we were to arrive to say it was our anniversary. Upon check-in we were greeted with Happy Anniversary and an upgrade to the 26th floor (top) with a view of the city. The room was large and comfortable with robes, safe, mini fridge, microwave, coffee maker, hairdryer. The following night when we got back in there was dessert and anniversary wishes. It was so yummy! The doorman and staff were pleasant, helpful, friendly. Suffice it to say we will return and we highly recommend!
